Pay only for what you need

Trusted by millions, Outgrid powers teams all around the world.Explore which option is right for you.

Montly

Yearly

(save 24%)

Free Plan

$0

Free for your whole team

For individuals or teams looking to organize any project.

Choose Plan
  • Access to candidate database
  • Interview scheduling
  • Job posting on platform
  • Employee data management
  • Automated reminders
  • Automated reminders

Standard

$15

Per user/month

For small teams that need to manage work and scale collaboration.

Choose Plan
  • All features of the Free Plan
  • Email and calendar platform integration
  • Employee attendance management
  • Data analytics
  • International recruitment
  • User account management
  • CRM integration

Premium

$25

Per user/month

For small teams that need to manage work and scale collaboration.

Choose Plan
  • All features of the Standard Plan, plus:
  • Recruiting employees with testing
  • Employee performance management
  • Create interactive forms that connect

Free Plan

$0

Free for your whole team

For individuals or teams looking to organize any project.

Choose Plan
  • Access to candidate database
  • Interview scheduling
  • Job posting on platform
  • Employee data management
  • Automated reminders
  • Automated reminders

Standard

$12

Per user/month if billed annually

For small teams that need to manage work and scale collaboration.

Choose Plan
  • All features of the Free Plan
  • Email and calendar platform integration
  • Employee attendance management
  • Data analytics
  • International recruitment
  • User account management
  • CRM integration

Premium

$20

Per user/month if billed annually

For small teams that need to manage work and scale collaboration.

Choose Plan
  • All features of the Standard Plan, plus:
  • Recruiting employees with testing
  • Employee performance management
  • Create interactive forms that connect

Achieve strategic goals and retain top talent.

We offer support by phone, email, and chat before and after launch.

We provide support through phone, email, and instant chat channels both before and after your website’s launch for a hassle-free experience.

Our dedicated customer success team regularly reviews solutions.

With a focus on your success, our dedicated customer team offers regular solution reviews and support to help you meet your goals

Integrate Outgrid data with data from other sources.

We understand that success is important to you, which is why our dedicated customer team is here to provide ongoing support and guidance.

Our aim is to ensure your success.

Our committed team is always available to help you maximize the benefits of using Appraisd. We provide support for both UK and US time zones, inclusive success plans, and immediate web chat assistance for managers and employees. Get in touch with us to discover more.
Talk to expert

There are No Stupid Questions, Ask Away, We’re All Ears
